channel.title: Gmod (Nightmare House)
channel.description:
Well I heard of this map for Gmod called "Nightmare House"
I have Gmod just not for steam so it is it's own seperate game.
I was wandering if you could give me a link to it so i could download i couldn't find it anywhere on google. Only on garrysmod.org or whatever.
Oh and so i heard it was scary is it?
Talk about your favorite Gmod map as well!
